name: Invuln
description:
This game was made for the Wowie 3.0 GameJam. Invuln is a 2d platformer inspired by Celeste. Most of the development time went into getting the movement right and level design.  Gamepads should be supported!

In-Game Music composed by Rosko Vair and Zanilis.

Menu Music composed by  Rosko Vair.

(On the top right of the game there is a button to swap between the songs, be sure to check them both out!)

Windows Key + Enter for full screen

Controls (keyboard)

  • A - Moves Left
  • D - Moves Right
  • Space bar - Jumps
  • S (hold) + Space bar (while on the ground) - Long jump (you get an extra jump in the air if you hit space bar again)
  • Shift - Dash
  • E - Stops your long jump ( not used much)
  • Enter - Selects New game or Exit in the menu

Controls(gamepad - xbox)

  • Left Analogue stick - Moves Left and Right
  • A Button(or equivalent) - Jumps and Enters the game from the menu
  • Right Trigger + A Button - Long jump
  • Left Trigger - Dash
  • Select Button - Changes song

SFX links (ill update soon)
